column4: I just installed ubuntu 8.04 on a Lenovo Thinkpad X61 Tablet, works fine apart from some minor issues I've been able to correct using info found on the internet, however the microphone doesn't work and I haven't been able to find out how to fix it. I'm not an experienced ubuntu user. Can anyone help?
It is not a settings issue, I'm pretty sure
have to ask - have you tried unmuting it in the mixer?
maybe try install alsamixergui and see if changing something in that helps
